```{.r .cell-code}
library(epifitter)
```
:::


Importação


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
soja <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=866852711")
```
:::


Transformar para fator = preciso tranformar fator pois esta como número


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
soja <- soja |> 
  mutate(TRAT = as.factor(TRAT),
         BLOCO = as.factor(BLOCO))

is.vector(soja)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
is.factor(soja$TRAT)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::
:::


Vizualiza


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dfc <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, DFC)) +
  geom_jitter(which = 0.05)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in geom_jitter(which = 0.05): Ignoring unknown parameters: `which`
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fer <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, FER)) +
  geom_jitter(which = 0.05)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in geom_jitter(which = 0.05): Ignoring unknown parameters: `which`
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prod <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, PROD)) +
  geom_jitter(which = 0.05)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in geom_jitter(which = 0.05): Ignoring unknown parameters: `which`
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Para juntar os 3 graficos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
(dfc+fer+prod)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dfc <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, DFC)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fer <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, FER)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prod <- soja |> 
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, PROD)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "gray70") +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = "black")

dfc
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
(dfc+fer+prod)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


anova DFC


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_dfc <- lm(DFC ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)
anova(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: DFC
          Df  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 149.299 21.3284 51.5490 8.218e-12 ***
BLOCO      3   0.461  0.1537  0.3716    0.7743    
Residuals 21   8.689  0.4138                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.532).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(aov_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.978).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_dfc <- emmeans(aov_dfc, ~ TRAT)
medias_dfc
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 TRAT emmean    SE df lower.CL upper.CL
 1     10.88 0.322 21    10.21    11.54
 2      6.42 0.322 21     5.76     7.09
 3      6.05 0.322 21     5.38     6.72
 4      4.75 0.322 21     4.08     5.42
 5      4.20 0.322 21     3.53     4.87
 6      4.00 0.322 21     3.33     4.67
 7      4.08 0.322 21     3.41     4.74
 8      4.58 0.322 21     3.91     5.24

Results are averaged over the levels of: BLOCO 
Confidence level used: 0.95 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pwpm(medias_dfc)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
        1       2       3       4       5       6       7       8
1 [10.87]  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001  <.0001
2   4.450 [ 6.42]  0.9896  0.0249  0.0017  0.0006  0.0009  0.0107
3   4.825   0.375 [ 6.05]  0.1329  0.0107  0.0040  0.0058  0.0628
4   6.125   1.675   1.300 [ 4.75]  0.9202  0.7173  0.8072  0.9999
5   6.675   2.225   1.850   0.550 [ 4.20]  0.9998  1.0000  0.9896
6   6.875   2.425   2.050   0.750   0.200 [ 4.00]  1.0000  0.9020
7   6.800   2.350   1.975   0.675   0.125  -0.075 [ 4.07]  0.9499
8   6.300   1.850   1.475   0.175  -0.375  -0.575  -0.500 [ 4.57]

Row and column labels: TRAT
Upper triangle: P values   adjust = "tukey"
Diagonal: [Estimates] (emmean) 
Lower triangle: Comparisons (estimate)   earlier vs. later
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cld(medias_dfc, Letters = LETTERS)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 TRAT emmean    SE df lower.CL upper.CL .group
 6      4.00 0.322 21     3.33     4.67  A    
 7      4.08 0.322 21     3.41     4.74  A    
 5      4.20 0.322 21     3.53     4.87  A    
 8      4.58 0.322 21     3.91     5.24  AB   
 4      4.75 0.322 21     4.08     5.42  AB   
 3      6.05 0.322 21     5.38     6.72   BC  
 2      6.42 0.322 21     5.76     7.09    C  
 1     10.88 0.322 21    10.21    11.54     D 

Results are averaged over the levels of: BLOCO 
Confidence level used: 0.95 
P value adjustment: tukey method for comparing a family of 8 estimates 
significance level used: alpha = 0.05 
NOTE: If two or more means share the same grouping symbol,
      then we cannot show them to be different.
      But we also did not show them to be the same. 
```
:::
:::


Anova FER


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_fer <- lm(FER ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)
anova(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: FER
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 978.87 139.838 55.1717 4.218e-12 ***
BLOCO      3   3.84   1.279  0.5045    0.6834    
Residuals 21  53.23   2.535                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Heteroscedasticity (non-constant error variance) detected (p < .001).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(aov_fer)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Non-normality of residuals detected (p = 0.008).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
## Tranformação por logarítimo

soja <- soja |> 
  mutate(FER2 = log(FER))

aov_fer2 <- lm (FER2 ~ TRAT + BLOCO, data = soja)

anova(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: FER2
          Df  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 11.5210 1.64585 42.9665 4.838e-11 ***
BLOCO      3  0.2064 0.06880  1.7961    0.1788    
Residuals 21  0.8044 0.03831                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.255).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Warning: Heteroscedasticity (non-constant error variance) detected (p = 0.035).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
b <- boxcox(lm(soja$FER ~1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lambda <- b$x[which.max(b$y)] 
lambda
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] -1.555556
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
soja$FER <- (soja$FER^lambda -1)/lambda
soja$FER
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] 0.6350214 0.6372165 0.6385564 0.6356880 0.6078962 0.5684565 0.6175462
 [8] 0.5902763 0.6032606 0.5512801 0.4882973 0.5684565 0.5684565 0.5264644
[15] 0.4882973 0.5264644 0.5512801 0.5512801 0.5264644 0.5264644 0.5512801
[22] 0.4882973 0.5264644 0.5264644 0.5512801 0.5512801 0.5264644 0.5512801
[29] 0.5684565 0.5512801 0.5264644 0.5512801
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_fer2 <- lm(FER ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)
anova(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: FER
          Df   Sum Sq   Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
TRAT       7 0.041641 0.0059488 12.9020 2.436e-06 ***
BLOCO      3 0.005895 0.0019649  4.2616   0.01687 *  
Residuals 21 0.009683 0.0004611                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.872).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_normality(aov_fer2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.787).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_fer2 <- emmeans(aov_fer2, ~ TRAT)
medias_fer2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 TRAT emmean     SE df lower.CL upper.CL
```

:::
:::


Anova PROD


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov_prod <- lm(PROD ~ TRAT + BLOCO,
              data = soja)
anova(aov_prod)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: PROD
          Df  Sum Sq Mean Sq F value  Pr(>F)  
TRAT       7 2993906  427701  2.6367 0.04021 *
BLOCO      3  105665   35222  0.2171 0.88340  
Residuals 21 3406431  162211                  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov_prod)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.215).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#homegenidade de variancia e heteroscedasticidade é a mesma coisa  
check_normality(aov_prod)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.542).
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
medias_prod <- emmeans(aov_prod, ~ TRAT)
medias_prod
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df_prod <- data.frame(medias_prod)
df_prod |> 
  
  ggplot(aes(TRAT, emmean))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(3000,6500)+
  geom_errorbar(aes(min = lower.CL,
                    max = upper.CL),
                width = 0.1)+
annotate (geom = "text", x = 1.2, y = 4200,
         label = "A")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-32-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Conjunto de dados couve


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
couve <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=1807247585")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cov <- couve |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, severity)) +
   geom_point(which = 0.05)+
  facet_wrap(~~ Irrigation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in geom_point(which = 0.05): Ignoring unknown parameters: `which`
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cov
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula8_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-34-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
couve |> 
  group_by(day, Irrigation) |> 
  summarise(mean_sev = mean(severity)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, mean_sev)) +
   geom_point(which = 0.05)+ 
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~~ Irrigation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

Area abaixo da curva


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#AACPD

couve2 <- couve |> 
  group_by(Irrigation, rep) |> 
  summarise(aacpd = AUDPC(day, severity))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Irrigation'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```
:::
:::


ANOVA


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
m_couve <- lm(aacpd ~ Irrigation + factor(rep), data = couve2)
anova(m_couve)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
